name: list_for_rent
attributes: # [doc = " 事前準備：NFT をレンタルに出品します。"]
# [doc = " - `rent_days`: 最大レンタル可能日数"]
body: let info = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_data ;
info . owner = * ctx . accounts . owner . key ;
info . nft_mint = ctx . accounts . nft_mint . key () ;

name: rent_nft
attributes: # [doc = " 貸し出し実行：指定日数分の料金を支払い、レンタル状態にします。"]
# [doc = " - `days`: 実際にレンタルする日数"]
body: let data = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_data ;
let fee = data . rent_rate . checked_mul (days) . unwrap () ;
data . renter = * ctx . accounts . renter . key ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT の所有者（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: nft_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品対象の NFT TokenAccount（所有者チェックのみ）"] # [account (constraint = nft_acc . owner == * owner . key , constraint = nft_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: rental_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"rent" , owner . key () . as_ref () , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 + 8 + 8 + 32 + 1)]

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 出品者（PDA シード用だが署名チェック省略）"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタルを行う借り手（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: rental_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の RentalData PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"rent" , owner . key () . as_ref () , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レンタル対象 NFT の Mint"]

fields.name: paid_fee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 累積支払い済み手数料"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在の借り手（Pubkey::default() なら未貸出）"]
